price: Àwọn tó ṣàì gbàgbọ́, tí wọ́n tún ṣẹ́rí àwọn ènìyàn kúrò lójú ọ̀nà Allāhu, (Allāhu) máa sọ iṣẹ́ wọn di òfò.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ وَصَدُّواْ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ أَضَلَّ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
